author: danov.optela
title: Cardano Community Hub Bulgaria
description:
保加利亚的区块链社区正处于发展的初始阶段，Cardano还不是很出名。
知名，但。

f6_assessments.q0: 该提案的一位作者提出了他支持在保加利亚开设一个新的中心的论点，其中一个关键论点是对积极参与的人的估计，从参加会议的2500人到作为观察员的180000人不等（在发表这种性质的声明时，我建议包括支持这些声明的参考文献链接）。该提案列出了可以在该中心进行的若干活动。虽然我基本同意该建议与挑战赛目标的一致性，但没有提供影响指标。虽然我基本同意该建议与挑战赛目标的一致性，但遗憾的是，没有提供影响指标，使我能够做出准确的评估。与该项目未来将遇到的扩展挑战有关的方面没有得到解决。
f6_assessments.q1: 积极的是，作者确定了可能在该中心实施的8种类型的举措，从课程到游说有利的立法。然而，他并没有提供足够的信息，以便能够对项目的可行性进行全面评估。对于未来的 "催化剂 "周期，作者应该考虑以下建议。(1) 列出提案实施团队的成员，包括对他们的技能和经验的描述，以及核实提案中的主张的参考资料。(2) 确定并描述具体的费用，这些费用应细分为可识别的项目，例如，场地租金费用、场地维护费用、执行关键任务的人员的估计小时工资、预留给教育专业人员的金额、主要发言人等。(3) 包括一个风险部分，确定提案成功的潜在风险以及消除或减少这些风险的对策。
f6_assessments.q2: 最后，不可能确定必要的数据来评估可审计性。以下是作者在未来的 "催化剂 "周期中应该考虑的一些建议：创建一个路线图，解释为使该提案成功而必须采取的步骤。至少每三个月应提供一个时间表。此外，必须建立一些成功的指标，最好将其与日期联系起来，例如，在XX个月内将组织XX次会议；由于参加了中心的活动，XX个新成员将加入社区，等等。对于社区来说，要了解项目的状况，并能将实际信息与计划信息进行对比，这些信息是至关重要的。

f6_assessments.q0: The idea of this proposal is good and it identifies the problem within the challenge. The proposer wants to create a community hub in Bulgaria which will introduce many people to the cardano ecosystem. This will add value to the cardano ecosystem as many developers, entrepreneurs and other profiles enter the space and help build the community up. But although the idea is good, a lot of information is missing in this challenge. For instance, I think that this proposal doesn't include key metrics that the proposer should add to improve this proposal. I feel, nevertheless, that the proposer has made the effort with this proposal. I think that the proposer can greatly improve this proposal by providing informations such as a roadmap, milestones, and KPIs.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal doesn't include enough information to be audited successfully. It will be very difficult to track the progress of this project overtime as the proposer didn't include clear milestones nor a roadmap. There is also no evidence of the skills and experience stated by the proposer as the proposal doesn't contain a profile link or any other material about this. Furthermore, the proposal is missing a timetable which can be used to measure the completion of the work. By adding the missing informations, I think that this proposal can do really good in the future as it has successfully identified the problem in the challenge.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal doesn't contain a roadmap nor milestones. KPIs are also missing, which make the project hard to audit as there is no reference that helps track its progress. Although the description of the problem in this proposal is understandable, the execution of it is the missing part. I suggest to the proposer to add these missing pieces and better structure the proposal in order to increase  its chances of being funded in the future.

f6_assessments.q0: The idea is good. The team point out the opportunity to bring Cardano enter a new and promising market. However the idea is still in high-level stage, which not include any detail break-down that ensure their action in transform the good idea into realistic project.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal says the team has wide experience with IT education, development of blockchain applications, online platforms and tourism but it's just saying, not detailed explain who are they, what they did that bring experience on the table. The plan need to have detail timeline/ milestone and KPI to measure the success. The proposal  doesn't include explaination for what 75000 ADA will be used for.
f6_assessments.q2: There is no metric to measure is mentioned or milestone/ phases to audit the progress.
